title: Swedish Pancakes
description: So called Swedish pancakes are worth a try: fluffy, soft, light.
story: I first tryed these in US. Very fluffy, light and absolutely deliciuos pancakes. Usually served with lingonberry jam.

ingredients.preparationNotes: lingonberry or maple syrup, berries, sour cream to serve with

instructions: Beat the eggs with sugar and salt.
Add flour and mix all together.
Start pouring milk gradually, keep stiring.
Let batter to rest for at least 20 minutes.
Then add melted butter, mix all well again.
Start cooking very thin pancakes, you can do either big (like crepes) or small ones.
Serve with ligonberry or some other jam, sprinkle with some powdered sugar.
